name: gypsum quarry operation | gypsum, mineral | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20420/documentation

This dataset is built on the gypsum quarry operation /GLO dataset in which some exchanges have been edited to make ith specific to India situation. Gypsum is hydrated calcium sulphate used widely in industries like Cement, Fertilizer and Plaster of Paris. The production of gypsum in 2014-15 year is 2.48 million tonnes. More than 99% of gypsum are consumed by cement industry. Anhydrite i.e. calcium sulfate mineral is found associated with gypsum commonly as massive of fibrous minerals with proportion of 65.7% Gypsum, 34.3% Anhydrite..  

Exploration, Mining, Blasting & Drilling

The activity end with the unprocessed gypsum mineral and anhydrite at quarry gate.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/081:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay/0810:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay
tags: Sector: Resource Extraction; Minerals; Cement & Concrete

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data collected and analysied for year 2014-15. and has been assumed that there is no significant change in technology.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset is built on the gypsum quarry operation /GLO dataset in which some exchanges have been edited to make it specific to Rajasthan (India situation).  As more than 80% resource of mineral gypsum occured in state of Rajasthan
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Gypsum deposits are usually found at shallow depths and are scattered over large areas. The deposits are mined out by opencast method and usually by manual mining except in few semi mechanised mines in Rajasthan.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset is built on the gypsum quarry operation /GLO dataset in which some exchanges have been edited to make it specific to Indian situation. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Environment statement report for gypsum mining in the state of Rajasthan and literature has referred.
